name: qt-virt-manager
tagline: qt virtual machine manager libvirt spice lxc kvm qemu
body:
![Made with libvirt](http://libvirt.org/madeWith.png)

qt-virt-manager
=================

A GUI application for managing virtual machines.
Uses libvirt as the backend management API.
Uses [Spice API](http://www.spice-space.org/spice-gtk.html) for graphic consoles.

Licensed under General Public License, [version 2 or later](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/).
